Class PropertiesServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • presenter.PropertiesServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class PropertiesServer
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This class job is to manage the user's selected properties.

    2015-05-19
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sarusi Ran, Gershfeld Itzik
